page.title: 13Child's Afternoon-Boars Hill
page.content: When our lunch break is over we come back into school to continue our lessons. We have a wide range of activities including painting and pottery and work with our computer. We have study topics including history and geography. During the summer months we practice country dancing outside, our favourite dances are Circassian Circle and Bridge of Athlone. We go by coach to Hinksey Pool near Oxford for swimming instruction during the summer term, we are awarded certificates showing the distance we can swim. I won a certificate for swimming 20 metres this year. School ends at 3 p.m. and I cycle home. Jackie Stockford Age 11
